item.title: Spatial Causal Inference
item.description: Causal inference in spatial statistics Spatial Causality: A Systematic Review on Spatial Causal Inference Conduct Multiple Types of Geographic Regression Discontinuity Designs(SpatialRDD) Spatial Difference-in-differences (SpatialDID) Evidence on the impact of sustained exposure to air pollution on life expectancy from China’s Huai River policy Rethinking ‘causality’ in quantitative human geography Inferring causation from time series in Earth system sciences Causal inference for time series Detecting Causality in Complex Ecosystems Partial cross mapping eliminates indirect causal influences

item.title: Spatial Association
item.description: Spatial Association from the Perspective of Mutual Information Spatial association between regionalizations using the information-theoretical V-measure
